title: Senior Year Scam
imgSmText: High school seniors run a fake ID ring from the school library.
imgText: A group of overachieving seniors runs a lucrative fake ID business, but when a rival group threatens to expose them, they must pull off one last big score.

title: The Viral Heist
imgSmText: Teens use social media trends to coordinate a series of retail thefts.
imgText: A group of influencers plans the ultimate heist: stealing from a mega-store during a Black Friday sale and broadcasting it as a prank, until security gets violent.

title: The Abitur Caper
imgSmText: German students pull an epic prank that accidentally exposes a scandal.
imgText: A group of German students plan a legendary final prank, but their hack of the school's system uncovers evidence of a massive embezzlement scheme by the principal.

title: The Kibale Code
imgSmText: Biologists in Uganda discover their research is a front for poachers.
imgText: Researchers in a Ugandan national park realize their chimpanzee tracking data is being used by a ring of poachers, forcing them to become unlikely crime fighters.

title: Paradise Lost
imgSmText: Tourists in Costa Rica get caught in a deadly drug smuggling operation.
imgText: A vacationing couple in Costa Rica accidentally intercepts a drug drop meant for a cartel, turning their dream holiday into a fight for survival in the rainforest.

title: Kyiv Blackout
imgSmText: Ukrainian hackers wage a cyberwar to disable Russian infrastructure.
imgText: A cell of brilliant Ukrainian hackers launches a desperate operation to cripple the power grid of a Russian city, drawing the attention of deadly FSB agents.

title: The Shenzhen Shift
imgSmText: Tech workers in China steal AI code to sell on the black market.
imgText: Employees at a Shenzhen tech giant conspire to steal a groundbreaking AI algorithm, pitting them against the company's ruthless and omnipresent internal security.

title: Bali Unfiltered
imgSmText: A YouTuber's live stream accidentally films a local political murder.
imgText: A travel vlogger broadcasting from Bali inadvertently films an assassination. To get the truth out, he must evade the killers who are now part of his live chat.

title: The Cairo Cipher
imgSmText: An archaeologist deciphers a code leading to a modern art theft ring.
imgText: While excavating in Egypt, an archaeologist finds a ancient cipher that perfectly describes the security system of a Cairo museum recently robbed of its artifacts.

title: The Helsinki Freeze
imgSmText: A courier must deliver a package across a frozen Baltic Sea.
imgText: A courier is hired for a simple winter delivery from Finland to Estonia, but the package attracts the violent attention of both the Russian mafia and Finnish police.

title: The Marrakech Maze
imgSmText: A pickpocket steals a phone that holds the key to a terrorist plot.
imgText: A young pickpocket in the medina steals the wrong phone, discovering it contains a countdown to a major attack. He must decode the clues to stop it.

title: The Prague Protocol
imgSmText: A diplomat is framed for murder during a summit in Prague.
imgText: A junior diplomat attending a EU summit in Prague wakes up to find a dead colleague in his room, making him the prime suspect in a vast conspiracy.

title: The Reykjavik Ransom
imgSmText: A hacker kidnaps a city's infrastructure and demands a crypto ransom.
imgText: A lone hacker takes control of Reykjavik's power, water, and traffic systems, holding the city hostage. A disgraced tech CEO is the only one who can stop him.

title: The Seoul Search
imgSmText: A K-pop idol is the prime suspect in her manager's murder.
imgText: The world's biggest K-pop star finds her manager dead before a huge concert. As evidence mounts against her, she must find the real killer in her entourage.

title: The Vienna Waltz
imgSmText: An Interpol agent tracks an auction house selling stolen art.
imgText: An Interpol agent goes undercover at a high-society Viennese ball to catch a sophisticated ring that uses high-profile auctions to launder stolen masterpieces.

title: The Internship Swap
imgSmText: Two incompetent interns accidentally swap companies for a week.
imgText: A tech intern and a funeral home intern switch places due to a paperwork error. Hilarity ensues as one tries to code for the deceased and the other pitches a coffin app.

title: Florida Man & Wife
imgSmText: A chaotic Florida couple wins a luxury cruise that gets hijacked.
imgText: The most chaotic couple from Daytona Beach win a vacation but must use their uniquely Florida skills to save the passengers when incompetent pirates take over the ship.

title: Punderland
imgSmText: A pun-loving tour guide leads a disastrous bus tour of the British countryside.
imgText: A guide who speaks only in puns must lead a bus of irritable Americans on a tour of historic UK sites. Their journey becomes a pun-filled race when they accidentally steal a prized scone.

title: Royally Messed Up
imgSmText: The spare heir to the throne goes incognito at a university.
imgText: Tired of royal life, a prince swaps places with his lookalike cousin to experience university. He must hide his identity while navigating parties, laundry, and unrequited love.

title: Autobahn Adventure
imgSmText: A rule-abiding German engineer's road trip with his chaotic brother.
imgText: A meticulous engineer plans a perfect road trip, but his spontaneous brother hijacks it. They break down, are chased by a angry nudist caravan, and must learn to get along.

title: Kraut Comedy
imgSmText: A rivalry between two neighboring beer garden owners in Munich.
imgText: The owners of two traditional beer gardens engage in an escalating prank war to win the title of Munich's best, involving pretzel sabotage and a rogue oompah band.

title: Roman Holidaymakers
imgSmText: An ancient Roman family tries a disastrous package holiday in Pompeii.
imgText: A weary Roman father takes his family to a resort near Pompeii for vacation. The trip is plagued by volcanic ash in the pool, gladiator timeshares, and a very suspicious rumble.

title: Mumbai Matchmakers
imgSmText: Two rival matchmakers try to set up the same stubborn client.
imgText: The top matchmakers in Mumbai, one traditional and one modern, discover they are trying to find a match for the same impossible client, a man who hates both methods.

title: Bangalore Call Center
imgSmText: A lazy IT worker's team must pretend to be American for US clients.
imgText: To save their jobs, a team at a Bangalore call center must perfectly impersonate a Texas-based team for a big client, leading to cultural confusion and cowboy boot disasters.

title: Safari Shenanigans
imgSmText: A clumsy tech billionaire tries to impress a date on a Kenyan safari.
imgText: A Silicon Valley mogul books an exclusive safari to impress a date, but his lack of outdoor skills causes chaos, including accidentally becoming the leader of a troop of baboons.

title: Carnival Chaos
imgSmText: A shy librarian must find her stolen necklace during Rio's Carnival.
imgText: A meticulous librarian's precious necklace is stolen at the Rio Carnival. She must embrace the chaos and team up with a charismatic samba dancer to get it back before the parade ends.

title: The Danish Fix-It
imgSmText: A Danish minimalist's life is ruined by his brother's 10 chaotic children.
imgText: A champion of minimalist living must babysit his brother's ten unruly children. His sleek Copenhagen apartment becomes a playground of chaos, Legos, and smashed hygge.

title: The Parisian Mix-Up
imgSmText: An influencer and a plumber swap phones in Paris.
imgText: A style influencer and a grumpy plumber accidentally swap phones at a Paris cafe. Each must navigate the other's life, leading to flooded photoshoots and very stylish repairs.

title: The Tokyo Tutor
imgSmText: A failed sumo wrestler becomes an unlikely English tutor for a punk band.
imgText: A former sumo wrestler must teach proper English to a rebellious Japanese punk band about to tour the US. Their lessons involve mosh pits and lessons on punk rock etiquette.

title: The Swiss Mistake
imgSmText: A precise Swiss watchmaker's life is upended by a yodeling champion.
imgText: A quiet watchmaker in the Alps has his orderly life destroyed when a famous, loud yodeler moves in next door. Their rivalry turns into an unexpected duet for a national contest.
